  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
        $("#txtSubscribe").Watermark("your email");
        
        var validcontrol = true;
        var counter = 1;
        function regularExpressionValidator(_selector, type) {
            var obj = $(_selector);
            var ptrnValue = obj.val();
            var pattern = new RegExp("^[-]?[0-9]+[\.]?[0-9]+$");
            if (type == "phone")
                pattern = new RegExp("^[-]?[0-9]+[\.]?[0-9]+$");
            else if ("email")
                pattern = /^([a-zA-Z0-9_.-])+@([a-zA-Z0-9_.-])+\.([a-zA-Z])+([a-zA-Z])+/;

            if (pattern.test(ptrnValue)) {
                validcontrol = true;
            }
            else {
                validcontrol = false;
            }
        }

        function resultSuccessControl() {
            if (!validcontrol) {
                alert(errorMessage);
                errorMessage = "";
                return false;
            }
            else return true;
        }

        $("#btnSubscribe").click(function () {
            if (counter == 1) {
                var APPROOT = 'http://www.fortewares.com';
                var LangCode = 'EN';
                var kontrol = true;
                var message = "";

                regularExpressionValidator($("#txtSubscribe"), "email");

                if ($("#txtSubscribe").val() != "") {
                    if (validcontrol == false) {
                        alert("Please type correct e-mail.");
                        return;
                    }
                }
                else {
                    alert("Please type correct e-mail.");
                    return;
                }
                var sendButton = $(this).attr("id", "btnSubscribe");
                var newslettercontent = {
                    EMail: $("#txtSubscribe").val()
                };
                if (kontrol == true) {
					var woopravalue = $("#txtSubscribe").val();
					woopra.identify({
						email: woopravalue,
						name: woopravalue,
						company: woopravalue
					});

					// The identify code should be added before the "track()" function
					woopra.track();
                    $.ajax({
                        type: "POST",
                        url: APPROOT + "/ajaxpages/WebMethods.aspx/ENewsLetter",
                        data: "{newslettercontent:'" + JSON.stringify(newslettercontent) + "'}",
                        dataType: "json",
                        contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",
                        success: function (result) {
                            if (result.d == 1) {
                                counter++;
                                alert("Your mail address registered successfully.");
                            }
                            else {
                                alert("Please Try Again.");
                            }
                        },
                        error: function () {
                            alert("Please Try Again.");
                        }
                    });
                }
                else {

                }
            }
            else {
                alert("Please Try Again Later.");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>
